arts.ttl: Hoffenheim secure crucial comeback victory against Bremen
arts.sum: Hoffenheim secured an important away win at Werder Bremen as they sought to put distance between themselves and the relegation zone, with Tom Bischof on target in an impressive come-from-behind display. In the 44th minute, Tom Bischof put the visitors ahead with a well-taken goal.

arts.ttl: Christian Ilzer: "Now we have to bring consistency”
arts.sum: TSG Hoffenheim’s coach Christian Ilzer hails his team’s reaction to last weekend’s horror show against Union Berlin. Meanwhile, Werder Bremen’s Ole Werner isn’t too pleased with his team.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim ease relegation scare with stunning win over Bremen
arts.sum: TSG Hoffenheim responded expertly after an early own-goal to beat Werder Bremen 3-1 away from home.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Hoffenheim preview: Bremen look to continue their European push
arts.sum: Two teams in need of a win for different reasons face off at the Weserstadion on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart set to sign teenage talent away from Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Germany's preeminent footballing publication reports that TSG 1899 Hoffenheim are set to lose one of their homegrown talents to VfB Stuttgart.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen reflect on hopes and tactical role for André Silva
arts.sum: Werder Bremen head coach Ole Werner and chief personnel boss Peter Niemeyer have had their chances to discuss how the Hanseaten might use RB Leipzig loanee André Silva.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
